cards.text: What is the name of this device?
What type of device is keyboard?
cards.tip:
Input device gives command to computer.

Output device provide result.

cards.text: How many keys are there in a standard keyboard? [___ keys]
cards.tip:
It is different for keyboard but standard keyboard has fixed keys.
(Write your answer in digits.)

cards.text: What do you do on a keyboard?
cards.tip: What do you do inside a notepad?

cards.text: What is the longest key in a keyboard?

cards.tip: It is used to move to new line in a notepad or word.

cards.text: What key is used to delete your word in notepad or word?
What key do you press with ctrl (control) key to copy ?
cards.tip: This key combination helps to copy any text or files.

cards.text: What does pressing  Alt + F4  does to any application ?
How many function keys are there in a keyboard? [__ keys]
cards.tip:
Function keys are buttons with F and number written over it.

Example: F1 ,F2, etc. (Write your answer in digits.)

description: Look at the images and questions to answer correctly.
